hooks.command: han hook run jutsu-rust format --fail-fast --cached || npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run jutsu-rust format --fail-fast --cached
han hook run jutsu-rust lint --fail-fast --cached || npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run jutsu-rust lint --fail-fast --cached
han hook run jutsu-rust test --fail-fast --cached || npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run jutsu-rust test --fail-fast --cached
